Source.Name: xdg-desktop-portal-gnome
Source.Summary: A backend implementation for xdg-desktop-portal that is using GTK and various pieces of GNOME infrastructure, such as the org.gnome.Shell.Screenshot or org.gnome.SessionManager D-Bus interfaces
